summary: Round 1 fixes verified. 2 LOW suggestions for consistency, none blocking.
round1_fixes_verified: evaluate_results_v2.py env var error messages - FIXED

issues.title: Inconsistent error message style between scripts
issues.why: apply_learnings.py and evaluate_results_v2.py use slightly different wording for the same config file not found error. Minor cognitive overhead when debugging across scripts.
issues.fix: Consider using identical first-line messages for the same error type, with script-specific details in additional lines.

issues.title: Comment could reference data source for None values
issues.why: Comment explains WHY None guards exist but not WHERE None values come from. Future maintainer may wonder if they can remove guards.
issues.fix: Enhance comment to mention Story fields can be None when parsed from incomplete Intercom conversation data or test fixtures.
